website_summaries.verdict: These 100% jersey cotton sheets are basic, cute, and comfortable.
pros: Great fit, easy to put on the mattress
cons: May have a slight chemical  smell at first, but it fades with time and washing

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these sheets. They are decently easy to clean. They are soft, and its just nice knowing they are made from those non harmful materials. Plus the packaging is so fancy, it makes you feel like you're getting something so rare, and extravagant. Wish they gave you 3 though instead of 2 for the price, but still awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long lasting color
customer_reviews.text: Sheets were just as described, super cute! They are not too thick or heavy like some Jersey sheets so they can stretch easily to fit the crib mattress and they won't overheat my little one. Arrived on time. Very pleased with the sheets and this company. Will definitely shop with them for other items in the future. I bought these in 2016 and the colors have not faded which is pretty impressive considering the many washings they have had due to the many messes they have endured from two babies and two toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Crib Sheet Set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of sheets! They are soft and very stretchy. They have deep corner pockets and plenty of room all around to go a bit under my 5" crib mattress. They fit snug but do not pull overly tight. I washed them first of course and saw no noticeable shrinkage, at least not from the point of view of how well it fits the mattress. I bought the two-pack and it was a much better price than buying the sheets individually. The patterns are very pretty too. I highly recommend these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: So cute and soft I love these! Plus the email I received after my ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute and soft I love these! Plus the email I received after my purchase gave a useful tip for nighttime changes which was so thoughtful and actually a really good idea! Double up on sheet and liner to make night time changes easier... why the heck didn't I think of that in the first place! Will absolutely be purchasing more as I like to have backups. We also use these in the pack-n-play since we travel and my little one is at his grandmas's during the day while my husband and I work. So I'm going to need plenty more of these! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the cotton crib sheets I initially bought for my baby's bed were shrinking and incredibly difficult to get on the mattress. I happened to have one pair of jersey cotton sheets that had a lot more stretch and fit so much better, so I hit Amazon to see if I could find more. I was so excited to find elephants sheets that matched my child's nursery, but even better than the pattern is how stretchy and incredibly soft these sheets are! They've held up well so far to multiple washes (because kids are messy) and I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: william harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet set!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these crib sheets for about 2 years now and they are still in perfect condition! They are soft and stretchy almost like a soft T shirt material. They fit well on a standard size crib. I recommend buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cute, gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: Soft, durable material. Came as expected and the colors don't fade even after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Amanda MillerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cute prints. Fabric is very thin.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product for the price. Bought for both a crib mattress and changing table. Prints are cute, just the fabric is very thin so it the mattress is cokoured or printed it will show through (unless using a mattress cover)
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: They are very soft and the pattern is beautiful. However
customer_reviews.text: They are very soft and the pattern is beautiful. However, there appear to be quality control issues. The first set of sheets I received had a hole in one of them. The second set I ordered as a replacement also had a hole in them. However, the hole was along a seam so my wife was able to sow it up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Buran

customer_reviews.title: Darling sheets
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are cuddly and amazingly match well withe quilt and other items I am sewing for my daughter's nursery for her son. I assume this company is well aware of market trends on what is being promoted. Anyway, they washed well, fit fine, and I would order again from this company. Good luck to the company personnel, who really seem to care!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice pattern but doesn't fit my changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern. The material is a little scratchy after washing. They also don't fit very well over my standard size changing pad. It makes the pad curl inward and does not stretch out. Probably won't buy these again because of that.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMeezy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very thin that you can see through them, which is very dissappointing. I was expecting a better material.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was impressive...very neatly parceled. The sheets were super soft as described and matched the pictures displayed. However, after opening the package, I washed the sheets without fitting them on the crib at first...I should have done that, then I would have realized that the sheets do not fit a standard crib mattress. A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: They are super soft and breathable. Still remain the same size and quality after many washes. My son loves the prints as well:)
customer_reviews.author: maggiechu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and pretty design. Fits regular crib mattress well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z

customer_reviews.title: none the less it is awesome material, detail in the picture does it no ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not read the that these fit a mini crib and or pack n play, even though it was described as this, none the less it is awesome material, detail in the picture does it no justice. Wonderful sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is amazing, the sheets are so soft and I loved the packaging. You can tell the company is putting a lot of love and care, I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, grayish white
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because the price is right. I would not call these "top quality" sheets. They are very thin and the white is a sad grayish color. I don't like putting them on my son's crib.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets. Pretty colors.
customer_reviews.text: Love these crib sheets. Looks exactly like photos and they’re really soft. Washed them and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, just as described. I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, just as described. I bought this as a gift , and haven't given it to her yet , so I can't give much more information . But I bought it off the shower registry so the one receiving it picked it out so that means a lot ! Will get back to you when she lets me know how they feel and fit the mattress .u
customer_reviews.author: DLPyozipgiz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute cute and functional. Whipping stuff out of this little pouch makes me feel like super mom. It holds quite a bit and just what you need
customer_reviews.author: Kai Raine

customer_reviews.title: How Adorable ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter, first grand baby, and I cannot wait to give them to her. They are so soft. Colors vibriant and so adorable. Want to order more but have to wait until we see how much bedding she receives at her shower. Great deal and again, ADORABLE !!!!
customer_reviews.author: NJane B-LO NY

customer_reviews.title: Expecting Grandma :-)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my first grandbaby's birth. Not here yet, so I have no real opinion on the sheets, other than they are adorable. My daughter-in-law thinks they are going to be just fine. They fit well and seems soft. The service was outstanding and the price is just right too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft
customer_reviews.text: Decent crib sheets and a fair price. However, not so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Aminin

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as expected, more travel crib size
customer_reviews.text: I would like the pockets to be deeper, they barely go over my travel crib's mattress (its a big crib, 43 inches long but the publication says it goes over 52" ones so I expected better pockets). The design is nice and the fabric is soft.
customer_reviews.author: GHSV

customer_reviews.title: The sheets are beautiful and so soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are beautiful and so soft and comfortable. I wish they made them for adult mattresses too. Just a note, when I received the sheets, I was very disappointed as they looked very dull in the packaging. But after washing them and putting them on the mattress, they looked beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: sav

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit the matteress after washing
customer_reviews.text: I washed the sheets and tried to put them on and it dint fit. The mattress size matches description. 28 * 52. Not sure if i got the wrong item or not but wish i could return them. I measured sheet after wash (couldn't before) it was 28 * 46.
customer_reviews.author: Adarsh

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because they were advertised as 100% cotton. They are NOT. Has some polyester in it. Quite disappointed because I had bought for my son with sensitive skin. The polyester makes it less absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: MUTOKA K. JULIET

customer_reviews.title: Cute set and good quality! Soft to the touch and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute set and good quality! Soft to the touch and easy to put on the crib mattress. Got the product quickly and the colors were as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: they are very soft and will be wonderful for our grandchildren ( one of whom is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got the crib sheets, washed them & began using. They are more of a beige than white but that being said, they are very soft and will be wonderful for our grandchildren ( one of whom is a new-born). They arrived much faster than I expected which really helped over the holidays! The seams are tight and fit the crib perfectly! Thank you for such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: cjg-60+

customer_reviews.title: Nice final touch for elephant nursery
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. We have an elephant themed nursery and I wanted some final touches. These were perfect. Only wish the second sheet came in other colors. My theme didn't have any blue in it, but that is ok. Love them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets for my son's crib. I just love the soft feel of the fabric. They go on easily and wash well. The colors compliment his room too. I will be buying more for my second baby when he/she arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with customer service from Cuddly Cubs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets as a gift for my daughter to use in the baby's crib. My daughter called to let me know she is thrilled with the sheets. I was very pleased with customer service from Cuddly Cubs.
customer_reviews.author: carla w. cohen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: These crib sheets are really cute and super soft. The only thing is they are a bit loose on my crib mattress, which could be a safety concern. But maybe with more washing they will shrink a bit. The design is perfect for a girl or boy, and again, they're SUPER soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns
customer_reviews.text: Soft and easy to clean plus they are super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crib sheets
customer_reviews.text: This came very quickly. It is a baby shower gift though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sheets were just as advertised, so cute, ...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were just as advertised, so cute, and no issues! I'll be purchasing more as needed once baby arrives! Thank you for the follow up emails, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Abbate

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft! I bought them as extra daycare sheets for my 1 year old but my 4 year old loves them also and took one for himself. Very nice quality and they are really cute in person. I'll probably have to order another set and hopefully they'll be more designs in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are sturdy but soft. They maintain their cotton feel wash after wash without dulling, wearing, or pilling up. I have had no problem with stains thus far, either. My son loves them, and I love the cute designs. I believe you should always have at least two sheets, so buying in a two pack is a headache saver. For what you are getting, the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Concannon

customer_reviews.title: This set is absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is absolutely perfect!!! The sheets are soft and cozy. My baby will feel great for sure. I've tried other brands and types but these are the best. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cucarina

customer_reviews.title: too cute, I purchased the mattress and use these ...
customer_reviews.text: too cute, I purchased the mattress and use these sheets as the wrapping. now the baby has a set of new sheets
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Clean up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets! They're soft enough for my baby & easy to clean for me. And the colors are perfect for our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: AB29861

customer_reviews.title: Love these crib sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft crib sheets. Definitely our favorite. Similar to a thin flannel texture. Super cute designs also!
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: since they don't have the greatest mattresses I really wanted them to have soft
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these sheets for our kids' cots at daycare...since they don't have the greatest mattresses I really wanted them to have soft, comfy sheets and these definitely fit the bill. They are super soft and snugly and absolutely adorable. Having bought crib sheets in the past that were $15 for a 2 pack, I debated spending the extra money on these but they are totally worth it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tjo Z

customer_reviews.title: soft sheets, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: SO soft. I use the chevron ones for my kiddo the most. they are true to color, and do indeed get softer with washes. i really love these sheets, had them for probably a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn Rain

customer_reviews.title: Favorite elephant design!
customer_reviews.text: Just love these soft and cuddly sheets. They fit the crib mattress perfectly. The elephant design is my favorite of all the sheets we have! The colors are subtle and very nice. Highly recommend these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: The Browns

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love,love,love these sheet. It matches everything in the crib. The texture is great as well. I have no complaints ❤ ,shipping was fast as well!
customer_reviews.author: chasidy lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby sheets.
customer_reviews.text: We love these sheets. They are soft and cute and easy to clean. They come beautifully packaged, making for a lovely gift.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but they shrink
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style and softness of the sheets. They matched my child's room perfectly, Unfortunately I'm online, ordering more sheets because they shrunk and barely fit the mattress anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are as described look totally adorable in the crib

customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift for a baby shower so I never have actually seen these sheets. the price was very reasonable and the product was shipped directly to the receiver of the gift in a timely manner.

customer_reviews.text: these were soft and adorable! Love them and would buy them again.

product_meta.title: Cuddly Cubs Fitted Crib Sheets Set – 2 Pack – Jersey Cotton Crib Mattress Sheets for Baby Boy, Girl Crib – Grey, Mint Green Elephant, Chveron Toddler Bed Sheets – Fits on Standard 28 x 52" Mattress
product_meta.description:
Cuddly Cubs Fitted Baby Crib Sheets – The Custom Fit for a Peaceful Nights Slumber


SKIP THE BAWLING & LET THESE bunny-soft sheets lull your baby to sleep. Crafted from 100% Jersey Cotton, mom's who switch to these crib mattress sheets say they notice a major difference in how quickly baby falls asleep, how peacefully they stay asleep, and how joyfully they awake.

THE SAFEST SHEETS – FROM THREAD TO FINISH

 * Guaranteed 100% Harmful Substance Free
 * Meets Global OEKO-TEX Certified Standards
 * Sensitive Skin Safe
 * Polyester Free
 * Allergen Free
 * 

THE EASIEST MAINTENANCE – NO LATE NIGHT LAUNDRY SESSIONS

Because late night blowouts are virtually guaranteed, we bundle each beautiful crib sheet set into a 2 pack, so you can easily pull one off, put the second on, and worry about the laundry in the morning.

THE SILKIEST SMOOTHNESS – BREATHABLE & SWEAT-FREE

Hand selected, superior strength threads knitted into the most breathable, comfy fabric you can imagine. Exactly what you'd want to sleep on yourself to indulge in a beautiful nights sleep (we're working on that mama!)

THE PERFECT FIT – CUSTOM TO BABY'S MATTRESS

Fitted down to the millimeter, these adorable sheets are perfect for your:  * Standard Baby Crib Mattress
 * Toddler Bed Mattress
 * Any mattress of 28x52 inch or Similar, guaranteed


UNRIVALED DURABILITY – LIFETIME GUARANTEED

From the fabric to the BABY SHOWER READY packaging, we pour our heart into making the safest, longest lasting, most beautiful crib fitted sheets on the market; sheets you'll feel joyful giving and receiving. Rest assured these bedding sheets rival the quality, softness and durability of any you'll find at high end baby boutiques, or we'll extend a full, prompt refund. Your happiness is guaranteed.
feature_bullets: ✔ SO SO SO SOFT – ONLY YOUR HUGS ARE SOFTER than our fitted baby crib sheets. Crafted from 100% Jersey Cotton in SERENITY INSPIRING designs, these are the Premium Boutique Grey, Mint Elephant crib sheets to get if you value crib mattress sheets that retain their SOFTNESS, STRETCH & ADORABLE PATTERN thru every WASH. (Machine Wash, Tumble Dry)

✔ PERFECT CUSTOM FIT – EASY ON, WON’T SLIP OFF: Every Cuddly Cubs fitted crib sheet FITS STANDARD CRIB and TODDLER BED, so they easily slip onto your baby mattress, with ZERO WORRY THEY’LL ACCIDENTALLY SLIP OFF over baby’s head. The extra deep pocket baby bed sheets, FIts Perfectly on 28 x 52 x 6 inch baby crib and toddler mattress.

✔ LET MAMA SLEEP IN…A LITTLE LONGER – DON’T WAKE BABY with those NOISY, ITCHY, SWEAT INDUCING crib fitted sheets you wouldn’t dare sleep on yourself. At Cuddly Cubs we use only the smoothest, silkiest threads to create our BREATHABLE, SWEAT-FREINDLY baby mattress sheets then bundle them into a CONVENIENT 2 PACK, so you can skip the midnight laundry sessions, and get better sleep yourself.

✔ SAFETY OBSESSED – THREAD TO SHEET: BECAUSE YOUR BABIES SENSITIVE skin lays against these jersey cotton crib sheets every night, we follow the STRICTEST Safety Standards, ensuring every crib sheet set is CERTIFIED “TESTED FOR HARMFUL SUBSTANCE” by GLOBAL OEKO-TEX, before placing them into BEAUTIFUL PACKAGING that creates a MEMORABLE UNBOXING EXPERIENCE. 100% Zero Allergen. 100% Zero Polyester.

✔ FULL LIFETIME REPLACEMENT PROMISE – HAPPINESS ASSURED: WE EVEN pay close attention to the elastic in these toddler mattress sheets, encasing every inch in our RELAX-FIT Fabric, so they stay as flat and well-fitting as the day you purchased. In fact we pour so much LOVE into crafting every sheet that PROMISE THEY’LL NEVER PILL, unravel, roughen, crease, scrunch, warp, SHRINK, STAIN, DEVELOP HOLES or LOSE THEIR STRETCH or we’ll HAPPILY REPLACE THEM for LIFE.
